overview: The Lunatics are running the Asylum! Wicked Pictures and Director F.J. Lincoln team up to give you a truly wicked portrait of a housewife (PJ) with a personality problem; she has too many of them! Each one of her characters has their own sexual preferences: Girls, Boys, Anal, you name it. They do it. So watch Miss Sparxx and two hot newcomers Ruby and Raye D' Ance do what they do best...
title: Many Faces of PJ Sparxx
